title: Elegant Emerald and Pearl Kundan Haaram - A Timeless Classic
materials: Crafted in high-quality gold with a lustrous finish
and genuine freshwater pearls (Moti). Meticulously set Kundan stones add to its regal appeal.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate vine design adorned with Kundan settings, accented by carefully placed emeralds and rubies. The pendant is intricately designed with a floral motif. The pendant is further enhanced by cascading pearls (moti) which add to the look. Contemporary blend with traditional essence.
colors: The piece features a captivating color palette of gold
flashes of red from the rubies and the soft luster of white pearls
occasions: and special occasions like seemantham or half-saree functions. It's also a sophisticated choice for modern gatherings
adding a touch of tradition to your contemporary style.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The combination of traditional Kundan work with contemporary design makes it a unique heirloom piece. The high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty. A true statement piece that reflects your refined taste and appreciation for South Indian heritage.
